      • Entity

        protected Entity(Game game,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 location,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteTexture,
                 int spriteWidth,
                 int spriteHeight)
        s Makes a new instance of the class Entity and add it to the game
        Parameters:
        game - : The game of which the entity belongs to
        location - : Coordinates of the entity
        spriteHeight - The height of characters sprite
        spriteTexture - Texture to use for this AI
        spriteWidth - The width of characters sprite

        public boolean destroy()
        Function that will kill this entity. This can for example can be used to remove enemies when killed.
        Returns:
